text:
I bought Xenogears' OST after discovering it in SupraDarky's lists. Probably the best invested money in my life...

Btw, all Xenogears' music is great...but this is my favourite song! Thanks SupraDarky for posting it!

I wish they released this game in the European PSN...I want to be able to play it at least once in life T___T
